snippet.title: Baldi's Basics The Ancient Save - Release Date Trailer [OFFICIAL]
snippet.description:
On November 16th, we celebrate the first anniversary of Lost in the Dark Woods! This game offers a rich storyline, building on the Baldi's Basics experience. Players are drawn into a deeper mystery, facing new challenges and unexpected twists. With added characters, puzzles, and secrets, it expands the universe with a thrilling and engaging plot.

Celebrate this special occasion with exclusive updates and content as we continue to explore the mysteries of Baldi’s world!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hi everyone I'm Cipherwild, I'm a game developer, a model maker, check out my games
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Currently Lost in the Dark Woods is in Early Access, a great open-world horror is developing, interesting isn't it?
